title: Espresso
description: A strong and bold shot of espresso made from finely ground coffee beans.

title: Latte
description: Smooth and creamy latte with a perfect balance of espresso and steamed milk.

title: Cappuccino
description: A classic cappuccino with a rich layer of foam and a robust espresso flavor.

title: Americano
description: A strong and diluted espresso shot, giving a rich coffee flavor without the intensity.

title: Mocha
description: A delightful mix of espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk topped with whipped cream.

title: Flat White
description: A silky flat white with a strong espresso shot and velvety microfoam.

title: Iced Coffee
description: A refreshing iced coffee brewed to perfection and served over ice.

title: Cold Brew
description: Smooth and less acidic cold brew coffee, steeped for 12 hours for a rich flavor.

title: Caramel Macchiato
description: A delicious caramel macchiato with layers of espresso, milk, and caramel syrup.

title: Affogato
description: A decadent dessert with a scoop of vanilla ice cream topped with a shot of hot espresso.
